about_the_game:
In Gardener: Master of Trees and Flowers, plant and maintain accurately simulated gardens, made of procedurally generated plant species of your design, grown with authentic agroecology gardening techniques.

Bring balanced growth to gardens across the world luring local critters and restoring native flora, manage lush orchards for seasonal profits, and design dream lawns, backyards, or forests. Carefully add nutrients to optimize the growth potential of every leaf and fruit, counter pests, fungi, and diseases with modern farming methods and natural solutions, unlock new areas and utilities, and learn how advanced pruning, grafting, and training techniques affect plant growth, to become a Master Gardener, on a quest to help Kodama and Yamabiko recreating the long extinct Great Tree.

Every Leaf Lives

With unparalleled simulation depth, each leaf, petal, and branch in Gardener: Master of Trees and Flowers carries its unique genetic signature, needs, and tale. Shape the bushes with precision pruners, train fruiting trees to maximize yields, and select the prime specimens for cloning or trade. No two plants are ever the same—each one is a unique living entity with its own story to tell.

The Apple Doesn't Fall Far From The Tree

Handpick the finest fruits and flowers, utilizing advanced grafting techniques to cultivate supreme species. By selectively inheriting the most desirable traits over successive generations, you'll cultivate rarities unseen in commercial seeds. Engineer your own highly sought-after varieties, paving your way to botanical eminence and unparalleled profitability.

For Sustainable Ecosystems

This isn't just another game about lawnmowing and propping up garden gnomes. Wield your mower sparingly and only when necessary, to create environments where critters and insects thrive. With diverse flora to provide pollination opportunities, tall grass to retain precious moisture, and an understanding that no plant thrives on a golf course, you'll cultivate a happy garden for delighted hedgehogs and squirrels.

Master Plants Care - From Lawnyards to Orchards

Each seedling is the beginning of an extensive voyage. Tend to your plants with diligent watering, provide ample sunlight, offer the right mix of nutrients, and fend off invasive pests. Monitor the faintest variations in foliage and fruit to detect issues early and respond promptly. It's the meticulous care that elevates plants to their utmost growth, sometimes exceeding even what nature intended.

Infinite Species Customizability

The procedural nature of plant growth allows for a never-ending variety of plant traits and combinations. Start with basic seeds and refine every aspect of your garden's flora, from the color spectrum of the blooms to their resistance to pesticides, by collecting new plant traits and genes from encountered flora. With countless potential outcomes, your imagination and perseverance are the only limits to what you can create.


Gardener: Master of Trees and Flowers invites you to adventure around the wild and forsaken of the world, transforming neglected spaces into thriving nature sanctuaries, capable of sustaining the rarest native species - many still hiding genetic pieces of their ancestor Great Tree. Guided by mischievous grove spirits - Kodama and Yamabiko, plant, cultivate, and design your way through diverse environments, unlocking new areas and utilities, to assemble the Great Tree from parts of its descendants, and let its fruit grow once again. Or just delve into the tranquil art of gardening and embark on an educational, botanical odyssey that turns the ordinary into the extraordinary.

  • State-of-the-art plant simulation, powered by cutting-edge growth models grounded in horticultural and genetic research.
  • Remarkable plant detail, individually brought to life down to a single leaf, each bearing its own unique characteristics, genetics, and conditions.
  • Each plant is a unique and unrepeatable procedurally generated specimen, shaped by a mix of accurate genetic simulation, random mutations and gardening care.
  • Each part of the plant can be tended to and harvested separately, educating about advanced grafting, pruning and training techniques to maximize yields.
  • Creating new plant species using powerful editor, selective breeding and artificial selection, with traits ranging from color differences and bigger fruits, to herbicide resistance and rare patterns.
  • Environmental factors dramatically influence plant growth, taking into account light levels, hydration, pest interactions, microbial activity, fungal proliferation, and the availability of key nutrients such as Nitrogen (N), Phosphorus (P), Potassium (K), Calcium (Ca), Iron (Fe), and Magnesium (Mg).
  • Entire ecosystems are in-depth simulated, with multiple inter-dependencies between small and large mammals, insects and microbial life, creating a living web of pests, prey and predators.
  • Customize, cultivate, and curate your personal digital Eden, exercising limitless creativity as you manage diverse environments ranging from cozy backyards, fertile farms, technologically advanced greenhouses, lush orchards, picturesque parks, to futuristic space research stations, each hiding unique native plant species with unlockable traits to discover.
  • Embark on the gardening journey with Kodama and Yamabiko, whether as a tycoon maximizing profits through efficient cultivation, a trailblazing botanist creating next-gen species, or a serene gardener designing beautiful, unique havens.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/SteamOS
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 / Core i5 7th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux/SteamOS
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 / Core i7 10th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700XT / NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Gardener: Master of Trees and Flowers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 / Core i5 7th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 / Core i7 10th Gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700XT / NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Go on a botanical journey across the world, utilize Master Gardener powers to grow and conjure plants with traits of encountered flora, use agroecology and gardening skills to sustain symbiotic ecosystems, and find elusive native species descended from the Great Tree to recreate it piece by piece.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
